Associate Project Manager
Nimbuspost
As an Associate Project Manager at My company, I oversee
end-to-end project execution, ensuring timely delivery within scope
and budget. I develop detailed plans, manage resources, and address
risks to keep projects on track. Acting as the key liaison between
clients, vendors, and teams, I foster seamless communication and
collaboration to align projects with business goals.
I lead cross-functional teams, providing mentorship and feedback to
enhance performance and productivity. Leveraging project
management tools, I implement process improvements to streamline
workflows and optimize resource utilization. My efforts drive
successful project outcomes, contributing to business growth and
client satisfaction.
Jul 2020 - Jun 2021
ERP Coordinator
United Plywood
As an ERP Coordinator at My company, I streamlined ERP processes
by gathering stakeholder requirements and collaborating with third-
party developers to ensure timely delivery. I facilitated seamless ERP
integration across departments, enhancing functionality and
operational efficiency organization-wide.
Nov 2017 - Jun 2020
Project Coordinator
 My company
- Orchestrated the company's business processes using ERP and CRM.
- Conducted research and development for implementing new
technologies to enhance business processes.
- Executed SMS marketing strategies to reach out to potential
customers.
- Coordinated and managed IT support tasks to ensure smooth
operations.
Projects
10 Months
Warehouse Management System
Developed and implemented a Warehouse Management System,
reducing inventory errors by 15% and improving overall efficiency.

of a 10-month long Warehouse Management System project.
Utilized lean principles to streamline warehouse processes, resulting
in a 20% reduction in operational costs over a period of 10 months.
2 Months
Finance Analytics Tool
Developed a finance analytics tool over a 2-month period, resulting
in increase in data analysis efficiency and reduction in time spent on
financial reporting.
Implemented advanced financial modeling techniques in the creation

14 Months
Call Center System for Outbound Calling (Internal)
Developed an internal call center system to optimize outbound calling

Managed the development of the Allocation Engine Microservice for

operations.
Led the creation of a microservice for shipment booking, tracking,

Designed and implemented an allocation system to distribute

Oversaw the integration of third-party APIs to enhance functionality

Coordinated cross-functional teams to ensure scalability and high-
performance under heavy traffic conditions.
Delivered a robust microservice architecture that improved shipment
management and operational efficiency.
Designed a front end panel to oversee the data and reports as
required.
2 Months

Implemented advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze

Get Assessment Form URL.Job Description:
Job Summary:
We are looking for a skilled Technical Project Manager to manage software development projects, coordinate with stakeholders, and ensure successful project delivery. You will be responsible for planning, execution, and tracking of technical projects.

Key Responsibilities:
Define project scope, timelines, and resource allocation.

Lead cross-functional teams including developers, QA, and designers.

Identify risks, develop mitigation strategies, and ensure timely delivery.

Conduct project status meetings and provide regular updates to stakeholders.

Implement Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall methodologies as required.

Manage client communications and handle expectations effectively.

Ensure adherence to project quality standards and compliance.

Required Qualifications:
Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.

6+ years of experience in software project management.

Strong technical background with hands-on development understanding.

Excellent project planning, risk management, and leadership skills.

Proficiency in project management tools (JIRA, Trello, Asana, MS Project).

Experience managing multiple projects simultaneously.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Preferred Skills (Good to Have):
Project Management certifications like PMP, PRINCE2, or Certified Scrum Master (CSM).

Experience with DevOps and CI/CD processes.

Exposure to cloud technologies and SaaS platforms.

Knowledge of financial management of projects (budgets, cost control).

response.text: Test Applicant, based in Gurugram, holds an MCA (2021) from Jayoti Vidyapeeth Women University and a BCA (2017) from the University of Rajasthan. He currently works as an Associate Project Manager at My Company, managing projects and cross-functional teams. Previously, he served as an ERP Coordinator at my company and as a Project Coordinator at my company. Test applicant is skilled in MongoDB, MySQL, Microsoft Excel, REST APIs, low-code platforms, and AI solutions, alongside expertise in project management and business analysis. You can reach him at applicant@gmail.com or 84938493894.

We're seeking a Technical Project Manager in Gurugram with over 6 years of software project management experience. You’ll lead cross-functional teams, define project scopes, and ensure timely delivery using Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall methodologies. Strong technical understanding and proficiency in tools like JIRA and MS Project are essential. Excellent communication and risk management skills are a must. A degree in Computer Science or related fields is required, along with preferred certifications (PMP, CSM). Experience with DevOps, cloud technologies, and project financial management is a definite plus. Join us to drive successful software development projects!

Get Job Description from Google Sheets.Job Description:
Job Summary:
We are looking for a skilled Technical Project Manager to manage software development projects, coordinate with stakeholders, and ensure successful project delivery. You will be responsible for planning, execution, and tracking of technical projects.

Key Responsibilities:
Define project scope, timelines, and resource allocation.

Lead cross-functional teams including developers, QA, and designers.

Identify risks, develop mitigation strategies, and ensure timely delivery.

Conduct project status meetings and provide regular updates to stakeholders.

Implement Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall methodologies as required.

Manage client communications and handle expectations effectively.

Ensure adherence to project quality standards and compliance.

Required Qualifications:
Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.

6+ years of experience in software project management.

Strong technical background with hands-on development understanding.

Excellent project planning, risk management, and leadership skills.

Proficiency in project management tools (JIRA, Trello, Asana, MS Project).

Experience managing multiple projects simultaneously.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Preferred Skills (Good to Have):
Project Management certifications like PMP, PRINCE2, or Certified Scrum Master (CSM).

Experience with DevOps and CI/CD processes.

Exposure to cloud technologies and SaaS platforms.

Knowledge of financial management of projects (budgets, cost control).

red_flags.consideration: The candidate's employment history appears coherent, with no sign of job-hopping or inconsistencies in timelines.

key_gaps: Lacks direct experience with Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall methodologies as specified
No experience mentioned with tools like JIRA or MS Project
Missing strong technical background in software development or cloud technologies
key_matches: Experience as Associate Project Manager managing projects
semantic_fit.consideration: The candidate has relevant project management experience but lacks specific methodologies and certain technical skills listed in the JD.

overall_evaluation.consideration: The candidate partially matches the requirements set by the company with relevant project management experience and ability to lead teams. However, significant gaps exist in specified methodologies and tools. Soft skills such as teamwork and communication seem strong, while their background and experience are appropriate, they lack some key qualifications needed for this role, resulting in a neutral score reflecting a moderate fit.

experience_analysis.consideration: The candidate's career path reflects continuous growth in project roles without any significant employment gaps, indicating a stable employment history.
